title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-11.11 - Stop valve on steam line
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-11.11 - Stop valve on steam line

State Regulations

Each steam line from a miniature boiler shall be
provided with a stop valve located as close to the boiler shell or drum as is
practicable, except when the boiler and steam receiver are operated as a closed
system. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-11.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
